project_descr: Enhanced mechanism in place for green sustainable cocoa supply from Ghana to rest of West Africa countries.

outputs.output_descr:
-Provide support to national land tenure reform processes in cocoa communities
-Strengthen national tree tenure process in cocoa communities
-COCOBOD Mass spraying programme strengthened
-Environmental management systems for cocoa 
-Environmental indicators developed for the cocoa sector 
-Cocoa farmer adopt rehabilitation techniques  
-Align with REDD+ initiatives
-Community managed forest buffer zones and biological corridors 
-Land use planning for forest conservation
-Monitor encroachment into protected areas
-Filling research gaps for environmental best practices
-COCOBOD knowledgeable on the carbon market 
-Voluntary carbon project piloted in cocoa landscapes
-Additional income sources from crops
-Outgrower schemes established
-Creation of a national cocoa coordination platform 
-Linking Environmental results to CCP programme

project_title: green a sustainable cocoa supply chain in ghana, w/a
